plugin.documentation: Unittest library run plugin, allows you to run your unittests.

arg.name: -android
arg.documentation: Specifies that you want to run your tests on android.

arg.name: -ios
arg.documentation: Specifies that you want to run your tests on ios.

arg.name: -path
arg.documentation: Specfies the path to your apk file. By default it searches for "Export/android/bin/bin/APPLICATION_NAME-release.apk"

arg.name: -port
arg.documentation: Define a port number to be used by unittest.TestHTTPLogger and Python test result listener.

arg.name: -simulator
arg.documentation: Set this flag if you want to run the iOS unit tests in the simulator.

arg.name: -wipeemulator
arg.documentation: Use this if you want to wipe the user data with the start of the emulator.
